column4: Hello everyone. I recently updated everything, including the kernel, and I think I need to update some audio things because it's all silent here now. any tips? please?
what kind of sound card do you have?
evil: did you upgrade from 7.1 to 8.04?
Jack: I know, but I uninstalled the re installed first
nope, just a full-upgrade from maybe two weeks ago
Jack: ok, so how do i start fresh?
evil: what version do you have?
evil: hardy still has probs, however it found my realtek card fine
evil: maybe goto the manf and see about linux drivers
It's been working just fine since the release until this upgrade
